name: Axlias
description:
Ezri, the ship captain has crashed onto this alien world PX-1834, due to an asteroid storm in orbit while she was conducting scans of the planet for advanced technology. Long range probes detected a weak signal coming from this planet. She must now survive this hostile world until she can escape or be rescued.

---THIS IS EARLY ALPHA RELEASE---

v27 is out!

This version is a 2 part download.

---

v23 is out!
--Release Notes:

Notes:
To take a screen shot press P.
To record Video Press F5.
To stop recording video press F5.
ESC is the exit button.
awsd is the direction movement keys.
Use the mouse to move the camera.

v13
---
There are a few new updates to this release.
A cave was added.
Lighting and some of the grass on the main map were altered.
The exit system was worked on. I beleave the crashing problem is gone now.
Some hidden items were removed due to bugs.
The nipples on the main character were edited to be more realistic.
Lots of the cave system was redesigned.
